# <a name="organize-your-email"></a><span data-ttu-id="59afe-102">Organiziranje e-pošte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="59afe-102">Organize your email</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="59afe-103">U programu Outlook na webu možete koristiti naredbe kao što su **čišćenje** i **Premještanje** da biste automatski izbrisali ili premjestili poruke od određenog pošiljatelja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="59afe-103">In Outlook on the web, you can use commands like **Sweep** and **Move to** to automatically delete or move messages from a particular sender.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="59afe-104">Te se naredbe prikazuju iznad popisa poruka kada odaberete poruku u ulaznoj pošti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="59afe-104">These commands appear above the message list when you select a message in your inbox.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="59afe-105">**Očisti**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="59afe-105">**Sweep**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="59afe-106">omogućuje brzo brisanje poruka u ulaznoj pošti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="59afe-106">lets you quickly delete messages in your inbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="59afe-107">Možete automatski izbrisati sve dolazne poruke e-pošte od tog pošiljatelja, zadržati samo najnoviju e-poštu i izbrisati ostatak ili izbrisati e-poštu stariju od 10 dana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="59afe-107">You can automatically delete all incoming email from that sender, keep only the latest email and delete the rest, or delete email older than 10 days.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="59afe-108">**Premještanje na**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="59afe-108">**Move to**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="59afe-109">omogućuje pomicanje poruke određenoj poruci u neku drugu mapu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="59afe-109">lets you move a message a specific message to another folder.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="59afe-110">Dodatne informacije potražite u članku [rad s mapama poruka u programu Outlook na webu](https://support.office.com/article/ae0f10d6-54e7-4f29-acd3-78cdc3fdcb9f).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="59afe-110">To learn more, see [Working with message folders in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/ae0f10d6-54e7-4f29-acd3-78cdc3fdcb9f).</span></span>
